name: Ecumenical Hunger Program Donations
description: Accepts donations of clothing, housewares, furniture, small appliances, and more; serves East Palo Alto and neighboring communities; pickup available for large items
fullDescription: The Ecumenical Hunger Program accepts donations of household items and clothing to support their services for low-income families in East Palo Alto and surrounding communities.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing donations
- Accept housewares and furniture
- Accept small appliances
- Pickup available for large items
- Serves East Palo Alto area
- Supports community food programs
howToGetIt:
1. Visit EHP donation center
2. Bring gently used items
3. Schedule pickup for large items
4. Donations support local families
5. Check accepted items list
6. Get donation receipt
address: 2411 Pulgas Avenue, East Palo Alto, CA 94303
keywords: EHP, Ecumenical Hunger Program, East Palo Alto, donate clothes, donate furniture, household donation, clothing donation, pickup, charity donation, low-income support
